item.title: Who will help, i will give for him donator
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

You don’t need more, you need to decrease the amount that the JVM is allocating because Windows can’t handle it.

Try decreasing the xmx value in your batch, like Scape-JAVA said. Let us know how it works.

Read full topic

RandQm:

increase the xmx value in your batch, should help

Increase? It’s because to much memory is being allocated during the intialization of the JVM…Why would he increase the value? That would cause his error to persist.

item.title: Who will help, i will give for him donator
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

You’re getting this because there is not enough memory on your computer to handle the initial launch of the JVM because too much memory is being allocated.

Simply lower the amount of memory allocated during the initialization of the JVM. Right click your run batch file program, and look for -Xmx and change the number to allocate a lower amount of memory.

Read full topic
item.source: Who will help, i will give for him donator

reboot Windows and, before starting any other apps, launch the Java app that needs the big chunk of memory

item.title: Who will help, i will give for him donator
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

It's because of how the JVM allocates memory on Windows; it insists on allocating a contiguous chunk of memory, which often Windows can't provide, even if there are enough separate chunks to satisfy the allocation request. There are utilities that will try to help Windows "defrag" its memory, which would, in theory, help this situation; but I've not really tried them in earnest so can't speak to their effectiveness. One thing that I've heard sometimes that might help is to reboot Windows and, before starting any other apps, launch the Java app that needs the big chunk of memory. If you're lucky, Windows won't have fragmented its memory space yet and Java will get the contiguous block that is asks for.

Help is free here.

Read full topic
item.source: Who will help, i will give for him donator
